document_data.name: Clothiers' Quarter
document_data.mainbody: The '''Clothiers' Quarter''' was one of the four quarters of [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name="CoD.M>
document_data.Description: The Clothiers' Quarter encompassed the [[Clothiers' District]], [[Merchants' District]], and the seedy [[Northwest District]], forming the west and northwest portion of the city. Thanks to the sprawling [[Grand Bazaar]], and other smaller areas of trade, the Clothiers' Quarter was the center of trade and business within Golden Huzuz where anything from coffee to slaves could be purchased.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* the Grand Bazaar
* the [[North Center]]
* the [[Gate of the Ghost]]
